name: ALEON's Nightmare 2
description:
Welcome to the World of Nightmares!



You play as Aleon, you woke up in an unfamiliar place. You need to understand what is going on and get help from the surrounding objects. After that read the documentation to find clues and then get out of the nightmare world. You have to meet Jouka and get ideas from him about the nightmare world. There are strange creatures that you don't know where they came from. Your sense of reality has been destroyed. Now, you can't predict what will happen when.

You need to investigate the mysteries of the Nightmare world and find a way out of this world.
Corrupted puppets will surround you. Search the area, loot clues and objects, and save yourself.

The nightmare world includes different parts. Castle, Kingdom, Forest, and Dungeon.

The Gameplay:


A walking simulator with exploration, shooting and driving mechanics. Where you solve puzzles by interacting with surrounding objects.

Key Features:
  • Immersive look: Soft lights of sections, dark corners, and colorful images are waiting for you.
  • Player Voice Activity: You should not make a sound when you hide.
  • Hide and Sneak: Get over the creatures by hiding from them.
  • Psychological Horror: The unexpectable creature will horrify you.
  • Unchasable enemies: It's hard to predict when enemies will do what.
  • AutoSave: The game has autosave.

    This game does not have the same gameplay, content, and story as the first ALEON's Nightmare.
